Sports and Clubs: Cricket (in Ranjit Trophy Squad consecutively 4 years), represented many times in National Handball Championship for the State,
Social And Cultural Activities: Bring socio-economic progress in the State; make people more literate; tender medical facility to the people;abundant water supply for domestic and use in irrigation; and create resource of income for many
Educational Qualifications: M.B.A. Educated at Institute of Marketing and Management
Other Information: Honorary Wild Life Warden, Khurda and six times consecutive `State Award` for best actor; worked as Actor for 150 regional movies and by now worked in more than 5 different regional movies; work for socio-economic development of the state with special emphasis on literacy, provision of medical facilities, water supply for both domestic and irrigation purposes and generating sources of income for the people
